summary: Icicle Valley provides hours of questing adventure, new world-spaces, dozens of quests, custom voiced characters, combat, unique spells, player-homes, followers, trainers, merchants, and even a fully-voiced companion who wants to help you take over the world.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3][b][size=4]Stand-alone version of Icicle Valley is outdated and no longer supported.
Please instead use...[/size][/b]

[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75451][b][size=5]QAXE'S QUESTORIUM[/size][/b][/url][/center]

[size=2][b][color=orange]ICICLE VALLEY[/color][/b] provides many hours of questing adventure through original world-spaces, battling hordes of enemies with dozens of unique spells and so on. There is not one all-encompassing story arc here, and nobody is going to walk up to you in game and tell you what to do. Grab a ride from one of the supply carts near the stables in Riften or Whiterun, and you'll be in Icicle Valley before you know it.

There are dozens of quests and adventures in this mod. Join the School Of Spellcasting, free some prisoners from Ft. Ostrefjell, explore a dwemer ruin. Perhaps the most challenging struggle awaits you in Castle Aegathon. Taking the castle and earning the title of Lord of Icicle Valley will open up more questing possibilities. As lord you may upgrade the castle, raise new banners, sell vacant houses, find ways to finance your city and expand your realm.

[b][color=orange]QUESTING:[/color][/b] Quest-related characters are generally voiced. Listen to your quest-givers, read notes, journals, and letters.

[/size][b][color=orange]ENEMIES:[/color][/b] While any level player can enjoy Icicle Valley, it was created to give higher-level players something to do. Enemies in this mod will kill you. They aren't just tougher, there are a LOT more of them. You may have to adjust your fighting style. This isn't...kill a couple bandits while you talk on the phone time. I suggest stocking up on potions.

[b][color=orange]HOME PURCHASE:[/color][/b] Not ready to take the castle just yet? Valley View is a player-home with upgrade options, located just inside the front gate up the stairs to the right. Read the brochure on the table for more info on how to purchase and furnish this home. Decide against buying? Tell Anders, and he'll sell it to someone else.

[b][color=orange]UNIQUE SPELLS & ITEMS:[/color][/b] School of Spellcasting is a unique school, as such many of the spells available here are different than those found elsewhere. To balance rewards with the challenges presented, some loot items are quite powerful. Use, sell or leave them. I just bake free cookies, don't complain if they aren't the type you like

[b][color=orange]UPDATES? [/color][/b] Icicle Valley is now part of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75451/]Qaxe's Questorium[/url] which is regularly updated. Qaxe's Questorium contains over 60 quests, with around 80 custom-voiced characters, dozens of custom spells, over 100 new textures, unique items, drinks, custom-voiced MALE followers, player-homes, towns, spread out in 8 custom world-spaces. QQ is the ONLY mod with a male, Akavirii (Japanese) speaking, Argonian smuggler.

[b][color=orange]PERMISSIONS:[/color][/b] This mod is the creative property of the author. The author does NOT give permission for re-uploading this mod, edits/renditions/merges of this mod on this or any other website(s). Translations and patches may not contain my files. If you see this mod anywhere but but here please report it.

[b][color=orange]THANK YOU![/color][/b]
Old Book: Ideas, advice, characters, [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnVz2Ryao3G4LDEEyeTAiRw]OAK&IV Skyrim Videos[/url] and support.
[url=http://www.amazon.com/Medousa-Michael-F-Butchin/dp/1519383177]Michael Butchin[/url]: Voices and everything[i] Voryn Dreleth[/i] related.
[url=https://annavoz.com/]Anna Castiglioni[/url] of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/58357]Anna NPCs[/url]: Voices
[url=https://soundcloud.com/littlecuppajo]Jessica Osborne[/url]: Voices
JKNJB & Jim Belfiore: voices
Lizzard: voices
Pandanami & Luna: voices

These tools were integral in the creation and sharing of this mod:
The Creation Kit, TESVedit, Merge Plugins, BSAUnpacker, Unfuzer, NifSkope, Oscape, TES5LODGen, Voice File Reference Tool.
author: Qaxe Qaixaci

files.name: Icicle Valley V40
files.changelogHtml:
Update 40, Jan. - Mar. 2016 (Big One)
1. School of Spellcasting
- New lab space with unique wall decorations replaces old dining table.
- New Dining room, kitchen and student quarters on lower floor. (Separated now)
- New Practice hall for students. (Quest-locked. Speak with Master Pholea.)
- Newly voiced masters have short quests meant to improve the boring "Train me. Here's some septims." dialog.
- Masters Pholea, Vexardht, and Marv Epi all voiced.
- Further training is possible for members only, AFTER the master's initial quest/lecture is complete.
(Join the school by helping Ch'thonia fix the teleporter.)
- Masters Vexardht and Marv Epi arrive AFTER Kepri Xuhl.
- Original skill books provided during some dialogs.
- New masters attend player's Lord ceremony instead of students
- Unique book covers now help differentiate spell tomes associated with this mod from others.
- Red "master robe" textures help differentiate students from masters.
- Unique spells from this mod can either be purchased, stolen, found in "dungeons", or learned during mage quests.
(No longer just sitting on a bookshelf in the school)
- Master Pholea's room and journal reworked.
- "The Visitor" (ILQ16) packages edited so students go back to their daily routine after player has spoken to Kepri Xuhl the 2nd time.
- Robes, gloves, shoes marked as clothing. Enchantments can be learned except from red dress, red master robes, and Cxynrn's ring.
- FIX: Fortify Barter spells "Fast Talker" and "Hypnotic Persuasion" spells did not work properly.

2. Farm added behind the Guardian Chapel (world-space expanded).
- Cave in farm section replaces old bandit-cabin above the Lost Prospect Mine.
(Previous edits made to the Lost Prospect Mine exterior cell completely cleaned up with TES5Edit.)
3. New Indoor Market, behind Frozen Fool Inn.
4. Storehouse added between school and inn.
- Clerk dialog is not a "quest" but does allow for new hunters and fisherman to supply Icicle Valley with food. (Immersion)
5. Front gate in Icicle Valley, ground section reworked.
6. Replaced wonky wooden bridge near gate with a proper stone one.
7. Guardian Chapel
- Training room wooden floor
- Sparring only takes place on 2nd floor
- Wall decor, including rustic wood plaques added.
- Replaced rich furniture with lower class type.
8. Twin Ponds/Auckland's house looks more like a werewolf has been inside when first entering. (Was too tidy b4)
9. Road-work behind inn. Removed extra steps and smoothed out road.
10. "M'butchn" drunk guard voices amplified, greetings added.
11. Priestess "Sister Sorin" has dialogue option to heal player.
12. I.V. Smith house remodeled. Lower ceiling, narrowed space, small upstairs, wood floors. More common.
13. FIX: Lockpicks added to smith merchant inventory. (Never added originally)
14. Kronid's shack items marked as his property. A note on his table clarifies that besides being a very dodgy character,
he is also Icicle Valley's last remaining hunter.
15. QUEST EDIT: "Lord of Icicle Valley" quest ILQ01.
- Quest will only start if the player reads the steward's journal.
(Got tired of players skipping stages and asking me why the quest doesn't work.)
16. FIX: "Icicle Valley Lord's Robes" inventory image set to correct image.
17. Valley View Bathhouse little bit of decor added.
18. Fix: Empty barrels in Icicle Valley marked "Barrel" not "Empty Barrel"
19. "Badon Uhl" campsite fixed. (Previous edit deleted most of this campsite)
20. Sewer guard wears white version of guard armor. Enchantments, etc. same as before.
21. Bard drummer outfit changed to more humble clothing.
22. Commander Aren no longer in "Guard Dialogue" or "IsGuard" factions.
23. Arresting guard in "If I'd Known You Were Coming" outfit changed to white Guardian type.
24. Teleport Home spells for the castle and Valley View still available, but moved. ;P

RED ROAD
25. "Old Smuggler's Trail" entrance: Ladder added (since Skyrim has no climbing mechanic, this ladder works like a load-door)
- Map marker moved to top of bridge.
26. QUEST EDIT: Added a stage in "The Red Road Seldom Unraveled" quest, that points player to "Old Smuggler's Trail" entrance

OSTREFJELL
27. Ostrefjell world-space COMPLETELY redone (from scratch).
28. Ostrefjell Tavern remodeled.
- Decorations & staff change once tavern is sold.
- FIX: Bard sings as he should (tavern location wasn't set as "inn")
- Guardians from the fort will eat here (after the fort is garrisoned)
29. "East Mountain Pass" added scaffold pathway & lighting so companions may follow.

files.name: Icicle Valley V41
files.changelogHtml:
- NEW QUESTS!!! Finally, the dramatic ending to the Sentinels quest-line!
Includes "Reach for the Sky" and "Pale Star at Dawn" (Requires previous quests from Badon to be complete)

Sentinels & Guardians
- FIX: Guardian and Red Mage Cowls now work properly with beast races.
- FIX: Frostbite Grove to Shadow Falls door navmesh issue discovered and fixed.
- FIX: Badon's "trial" Sentinels at Morthal can die now.
- FIX: 1 Sentinel with Captain Hastrel had horse-breathing sound fx...wtf.
- Change in Escort Service quest. Four in 1 escort can be annoying. Put 3 Sentinels in Frozen Fool basement, 3 in cottage in Ostrefjell. Dialogue option updated, price adjusted.
- Badon dialogue option to enable 9 "scouts" (follower type) and one support Sentinel each.
- Badon Uhl and Varrus Varro can be seen in Ostrefjell as prisoners.
- Varrus Varro also appears as a Morthal “Trial” Sentinel, and has a short greeting.
- Guardians & Sentinels have new black hood. Old type showed skin at neck.
- Previously, many Sentinels had been placed in every hold/town in preparation for a series of quests to take over Skyrim. Although they were invisible (disabled) that quest plan changed, and those locations were set back to their original state.
- FIX? Ebony version of Guardians removed from the "IsGuard" or "GuardDialogueFaction". This means, they cannot arrest you. Nothing is more immersion breaking than being the lord and getting arrested in the name of the jarl, or being mocked. White version are still real guards.
- Before starting "Lord of Icicle Valley" you can now join the Guardians! Speak to Commander Aren to begin your miserable role play life as a Guardian who hasn't been paid in a month.
- Added 1 Guardian in catacombs
- 1 bland "cutesy" female Guardian changed to khajiit for more variety
- Watchtower: Entrance to jail NEW, removed cooking spit outside.
- Watchtower: Prisoner in cell has random lines of dialogue.
- Watchtower prisoners can sleep.
- FIX: "If I'd Known You Were Coming" guardian stuck at gate.
- Kaarl keeps watch in city, not at Watchtower.

School:
- FIX: "Broken teleporter" Rift target changed. Old one caused a bug that trapped Cxynrn and Uther inside.
- FIX: Added 1 stage in the "Missing" quest to deal with Edwinna's nude corpse.
- FIX: Chthonia & LaVoisin are the only students who should go to lord ceremony
- FIX: Marv Epi won't "goodbye" after buying one of his books.
- FIX: Marv Epi has a bit of pocket change to buy a limited number of items (books).
- NEW: During the quest "Visitor" players can now talk to Marv Epi, Ch'thonia and the Guardian Commander about the situation at the school. Speaking to Uther Doul will only get the reply "Now's not a good time".
- FIX: S.O.S. Iji/Psysha meditation marker missing
- New book cover for "Violence" skill book.
- "Training Hall" exit in SOS edited to look more obviously inaccessible.
- More dialogue options during Chthonia's quests
- Follower type mage students, now have hood and robe in 2 parts. Helps with follower gear management

Other:
- FIX: Gaelan goes to his new house after you discuss the ore sample.
- FIX? Renamed quest letters/items with the word QUEST. "Quest: JoBob's letter" (etc.)
- Exterior Gate of I.V. battlements improved, statue of Talos removed, stairway better recessed into rock
- FIX: Several keys (3) incorrectly named.
- FIX: Red Road. Missing texture/mesh for "Red Road Guard bow"
- FIX: 1 Dremora in Aegathon Castle Grand Hall wasn't being removed with others at the end of the quest.
- FIX: Castle guard ghost-version in Blades armor had no relationship with player, so couldn't follow like the others.
- FIX: 2 windows in Twin Ponds house misaligned (previous edit messed up?)
- FIX: Replaced all instances of "Drunk Idle Marker" (doesn't work) with the "Tavern Drinking Marker"
- Quest journal in "Ostrefjell Prison Blues" slightly rewritten.
- FIX: Ft. Ostrefjell map marker data missing
- FIX: Ft. Ostrefjell blacksmith package now set to only sell at forge
- Ft. Ostrefjell "Prison" now "Fort Ostrefjell Miner Barracks"
- FIX: Ostrefjell barracks navmesh. Miner bumping into his chair
- FIX: Ft. Ostrefjell tower navmesh messed up during last update? Fecking navmesh.
- FIX: Removed Sybrn K'thul follower from "Ostrefjell Prisoner Faction" since members of that faction are deleted at the entrance to O.F.
- Housecleaning: ILQ02DeleteKaarlBoxScript & OstrefjellDeleteFleeingMinerScript removed, replaced by 1 script.
- FIX: M'butchin's force-greet in Frozen Fool now ends after he delivers his message.
- Jarl Laila/Anuriel jail-clones used in "Dragonblood Boils" moved to an inaccessible cell.
The cell used b4 was occupied by "Inigo" follower.
